column4: Can someone help me with a repositorie problem with unbuntu 7.10?
Anyone know why I am getting an error when I try to update my laptop?
its telling me the repositories are old or not functioning
I cant install or update anything Ubuntu 7.10
ah yeah that one's end of life
there are no more updates for it
Will the upgrade through update manager work? or do I ned to do it through a cd?
sudo do-release-upgrade should upgrade to it
Ok Ill do it and report back
any idea why I have to use the installtion cd to boot this computer because when I dont use it it says Operating system not found
try installing grub from the cd?
